description:
/*==== New Launch - 6 JUNE 2016 ====*/

If you really looking for real world web project course, then this course is for you. 

Build a strong foundation in basic real world website features with this step by step practical tutorial.

In this course, you will learn how to use HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and a little Javascript, to create real world website features. This course will show you step by step to create:

  • Beautiful Header Slider
  • Practical 3 Images Gallery Slider
  • Common Testimony Slider
  • Full Screen Video Header
  • Very Useful Navigation Tab
  • Contact Page With Embed Google Map
  • Bootstrap Affix For Fixed Side Info Section (or for Fixed Side Navigation Bar)
  • Masonry Blog

Reduce barrier by learn to do it fast and straight to the point

As you can see, this all is very complete for you to start develop your first professional website to real world standard strait away. As you will be shown the best practice to creating real world website features.

Real web developer approach

On top of that, In this course, you will learn how to use google chrome developer tool to overwrite bootstrap CSS until you can develop a very beautiful website that does not look like bootstrap. Using this tool, you will learn how you can easily debug your website. And this tool is what real web developer use alot to develop their website. By understand to using developer tool, you are a step ahead from other developer.

Content and Overview

This course is not for complete beginner. You must know at least basic of HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. But if you are a complete beginner, and you still wish to join this course, you are very welcome. Because this course will go step by step, from complete scratch.

At the end of the course, you will have a very good understanding to create real world standard features, and a very beautiful looking website as your portfolio.

"IF YOU REALLY WANT TO SPEED UP 300% YOUR LEARNING CURVE TO BUILD PROFESSIONAL LOOKING WEBSITE WITH FULL OF REAL WORLD STANDARD FEATURES, THEN THIS IS THE ONLY COURSE YOU NEED"

/*===== Come Join Me In This Fun Project =====*/
title: Build Complete Website Real World Standard:HTML CSS
